website_summaries.verdict: Good-quality, checkered apron available in several colors, part of DII collection of kitchen fabric products.
pros: Easy-care, 100% cotton apron is machine washable, machine dry on low
one size fits most with adjustable neck strap and extra-long ties
Part of DII collection of kitchen linens with "country chic" theme
Easy to personalize with embroidery or monogramming for a lovely gift
cons: Follow care instructions to avoid shrinking apron in dryer

customer_reviews.title: Faded... and dyed everything in the wash along with it!
customer_reviews.text: I washed the apron according to instructions with a bunch of other things that are darker - gray dishtowels and t-shirts, mostly. The color on the apron faded from black to charcoal and bled horribly (the white checks are now dishwater gray), AND left DARK GRAY MARKS all over EVERYTHING ELSE in the wash. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meganasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these buffalo plaid tea towles
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these buffalo plaid tea towles. They are perfect for where I am using them in my kitchen and dining room. I love that they came in a 3pk. I will definitely be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: FarmtoTableCreations

customer_reviews.title: Large, strange material, does not wash well, not absorbent, but still very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I got the red and white and the black and white. They're very pretty but also really big for hand towels. The material is not at all absorbent. They are much more like dinner napkin type material. In fact they're so large they could be used as place mats. I washed them and they got very very wrinkly. I have not tried to iron yet but i hope that restores them.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these dishcloths. If your using them only as kitchen decor they’re great BUT sadly when using them to dry dishes or glasses, they don’t absorb the water AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: kym

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ITEMS TIES ARE TOO SHORT
customer_reviews.text: TIES TOO SHORT TO TIE APRON WHAT A WAISTOF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big, but not very absorbent so far
customer_reviews.text: Love the generous size of these dish towels. I’ve only washed and dried them once, but so far they came out of the drier very wrinkled. They need ironing, which won’t happen here! They’re also not very absorbent. Both of these issues may improve with future washings. I sure hope so, because I love their size, and they’re super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled mess!
customer_reviews.text: These come out of the dryer a wrinkled mess! Never seen anything like it. They need to definitely be ironed before use. Yuk
customer_reviews.author: not a shill

customer_reviews.title: Cute but that's it
customer_reviews.text: I love how these look hanging from my oven handle. But that's about it. They don't dry wet dishes, they just smear the water around. They also shrunk considerably in the washer. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Black

customer_reviews.title: Cute when they arrived but after washing them they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute when they arrived but after washing them they are very wrinkly and somewhat shrunken on the sides. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Rather stiff and difficult to hold onto pots. I have put them through the washer a few times, hopefully this will cure the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Verigam

customer_reviews.title: Cute... but shrink when washed
customer_reviews.text: I love the print and design, however after washing they shrunk considerably. They are still unable but not the size they should be for handling hot cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: BIG and bright!
customer_reviews.text: So, I know it's nerdy to get excited about pot holders, but these are LARGE and work well, whether you put your hands into the pockets or just hold onto them. I am constantly getting burns on my wrists but don't like the oven mitts because my hands are small. These are just what I've been looking for, and at a nice price and bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dillon

customer_reviews.title: The only kitchen towels I will order
customer_reviews.text: These are literally the best kitchen towels I’ve ever owned! I love how large they are. Normally kitchen towels are small and get soaked after a few hand washes. The width on these goes the entire width of my oven handle and even folded in half, comes long enough to cover the oven window. My cat knocked his entire water bowl on the counter yesterday. I tossed the towel over it, pressed gently, and ALL of the water was absorbed! My towel air dried in about 30 minutes and I didn’t even have to wring it out. These towels will be the only kitchen towels I order going forward.
customer_reviews.author: StacyT

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These towels are a perfect decorative touch to bring in that "farmhouse" look to your home. How they will hold up as a towel, I am unsure. I am using them for show. (one is pictured here on the table, underneath a decorative bowl). As you can see, they are definitely black and true "bright white". Perfect for what I was needing them for.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is so cute right! And they you can find one to match you your little helper! It gets messy but the mess stays on the apron! The only draw back is the adjustable strap, yeah that don’t work. I tied a knot in it. But is is still cute and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: I love this apron
customer_reviews.text: This is my first apron, but I love it. It doesn't have a waterproof backing but the fabric is thick, sturdy, heavy, and tight woven so there isn't any threat of liquids getting through unless the liquid simply sits on the fabric for no reason, but this will protect you from splash or spills. The fabric is much like canvas or burlap. The apron is long, and wide. I'm a heavy set woman and this wrapped around me fine. The ties are extra long and not only was it easy to reach behind to tie, but if I wanted to they were just long enough to wrap around and tie in front.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice thickness
customer_reviews.text: Very nice thickness for use as pot holders or trivet. Usually I like to feel these kind of things in person, but I would definitely purchase from this company again. We purchased the black and white buffalo check plaid. Looks just as pictured. My husband was excited to see there are pockets for his hands, because he can’t fit into mitts. Very pleased. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not washable!
customer_reviews.text: I washed the pot holders like I do everything before using and it is like they were made from cardboard or something. Very disappointing. Crinkled and discolored.
customer_reviews.author: April Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!  IG @casadavis.decor . might not be worth the money tho
customer_reviews.text: These dish towels are really cute .. @casadavis.decor I love that they go along with many of my other decor patters. The only con is that they are not so absorbent. They are soft but not thick enough to obsorb water. Maybe they are made out of the wrong material. IDK. They look very cute tho, and they are big. SO if you are getting the for the looks, you will do the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuela Davis

customer_reviews.title: Vintage trendy dad gift
customer_reviews.text: Popular buffalo plaid. I bought these for my dad but he probably won’t appreciate the trendy pattern. Although, he does have a jacket/shirt with the same pattern. It’s probably vintage. Just saying, now that it’s back in style, old bachelors like my father are trendy again, and now he has dish towels that match his favorite shirt. They seem like good quality and I love that there are other products offered with the same print (like an apron and tablecloth).
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Not too absorbent. Got this for our trailer and will using this more for decoration then drying dishes. Doesn’t absorb water like I’d hoped. But definitely looks good as decor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dress up the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love the buffalo check especially for the holidays. I wanted these to hang on the oven to bring some holiday cheer to the kitchen. I thought they were a little long but liked them nonetheless (Refer to photo although I still need to press them to take wrinkles out from folds). Thick quality fabric. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY

customer_reviews.title: Potholders and Mitts perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love DII potholders. They are exactly what I was looking for. Quality is great and design is gorgeous. I bought the mitts as well. Heat resistance is great and very functional especially during those busy holiday cooking days. The color is vibrant , material is thick and not cheap. Stitching is fantastic. Price is awesome! I’m a hard sell and these are great! I highly recommend and will buy more in the future. Delivered timely and is absolutely perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline T. Achaigua

customer_reviews.title: Very large dish towels.
customer_reviews.text: Fair warning, these are massive dish towels. I didn’t read the measurements, I just saw dish towel and expected them to be the same size as the rest of my dish towels. I was wrong. So, I ultimately didn’t end up using these as dish towels, I instead use them as decoration under trays, vases, centerpieces, etc. and I absolutely love they way they look. They don’t wrinkle and they are incredibly easy to wash if they get dirty. I love using them with the rest of my red and black buffalo check Christmas decor. I will be excited every year I get to use these!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mann

customer_reviews.title: Oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: Sure, these oven mitts are super cute but I might as well use my bare hand to pull things out of the oven. If they can’t do the job then they are useless and a waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: The dish towels are a bit heavier than expected - a nice surprise. I washed them as soon as they arrived and they held their shape with very little wrinkling or shrinkage. I will be monogramming and feel the fabric is heavy enough will hold a dense stitch. All in all, a quality tea towel and good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieZ

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she just loves it. Her kitchen is filled with pink everything even her appliances! She always borrows my apron when she comes over so I got her one of her own. She says it fits well and washes up nicely. Sometimes she quickly runs a warm iron across it. Great apron and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Joette M.

customer_reviews.title: GF Wears it All the Time
customer_reviews.text: From the person for whom this was purchased: R Says "This apron is great! Resistant to sink sprayer blasts, protects clothes, and works as an emergency hot-pad. Throw it in the wash with the kitchen towels and give the straps a twang to discourage twisting. Plus, it's super cute."
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchum

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled mess... not attractive towels.
customer_reviews.text: Stiff upon opening the package they arrived in, and not as absorbent as I'd hoped, so I washed them (as all towels will need regularly) and they came out a wrinkled mess. They remind me of pajamas in the morning. This is not something you really want hanging in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Picklewacket

customer_reviews.title: These pot holders are unsafe to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on good reviews, and I love the red and black buffalo check. They are cute. However, they are too thick, stiff and bulky to use. After washing once, they are even less user friendly. They don't conform easily to one's hands and create a burn hazard. I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: !!!!!!!Caution!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday and was excited to use them today. Unfortunately, while taking a tray of vegetables out of the oven, I was forced to drop it onto the floor as my hand was burning sooo bad! DO NOT BUY!! Now I need to find a cream to it on my burned fingers. Returning asap!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, well made!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and well made. We ordered these for us girls to have matching aprons for Thanksgiving and they were adorable. Many friends where requesting to know where we got them. The only thing I'd change is you can't really put anything in the pocket because it would likely fall out. A little snap or button would have been nice so we could put our cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWifey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Thickness
customer_reviews.text: These were so much nicer in person. A lot thicker. Very well made. And a lot longer than I thought. They come up past mid way of my arm. Making them better for protection from being burned. Haven't been washed yet. So not sure how well they do or look after wash. Very Happy with this purchase. Also delivered very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy T.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Smelled awful when I opened the package. Washed before using like it said. They ended up turning brown and smelling even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Emily O.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very cute potholders but I would stress that they are mainly for decor and don't work very well as actual pot holders and they are not easy to clean. Despite that I like the way they look in my kitchen so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Shadaisy

customer_reviews.title: They look great but not as functional as terry cloth
customer_reviews.text: I love how these towels look in our kitchen. They are nice and large and the colors are vibrant. I use them mainly for decoration as they don't soak up water quickly or easily. I rely on my terry cloth towels for that purpose. I don't regret buying them though, they look nice hanging from our stove as decor.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry123

customer_reviews.title: Just fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this brand. Everything I have bought from them has met my high expectations. These are no different. Great quality. Material is not thin nor thick, just right. Colors true to photos. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Big thick absorbent & stylish.
customer_reviews.text: OCD clean kitchen, house...very particular in products that serve their purpose. Excellent quality, as good as it gets if you're unsure and/or comparing prices & products for hours.. like me, look no further, these are the ones! You will be happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jodester

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with very hot pans and skillets.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Chose this pattern so you can use them a couple of times before they get dirty. Bought them specifically to use with my cast iron skillet. They work perfectly on an extremely hot pan in and out of the oven. Made well with sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Fire Danger
customer_reviews.text: For years we have put a pot holder under a dish or other item in the microwave with no problems. Good practice or bad; I don't know. However when heating a potato this pot holder almost broke into flame. Significant charring and lots of smoke. I checked the other, I bought two, and it too showed signs of burning. Both are now in the garbage. Just be careful; it was a close call for us.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice overall quality
customer_reviews.text: Thick padding, nice design, just the right size and easy to use. My daughter loves them and they added to her Christmas gift as she is switching over to the white buffalo plaid in her kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but don't absorb water well
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty, large, good to 'dry' bigger items, inside and out simultaneously, but they barely absorb water. I like the corner hoop, but these are best used to cover small tables, as in tablecloths.
customer_reviews.author: pen and paper

customer_reviews.title: Well made and on the thick side.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron to wear and hold my change at a craft fair. The pouch in front worked perfect for the change! It’s a little long so I shortened it by putting a good size hem on it. The fabric is on the thick side, and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Katzapainter

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute but Not Super Effective
customer_reviews.text: These pink gingham towels are super cute. They are oversized like the listing states. BUT if you are looking to use as an everyday dish towel think twice. I had to dry each dish for twice as long as with my other dish towels. Doing the dishes is enough of a pain already; why make extra work?
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and big. I was honestly beating myself up while ordering because I could be less lazy and find much cheaper ones at a dollar store. But hey- they are good quality. I would buy them again. They are cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the style
customer_reviews.text: Wow these pot holders are very thick and they will hold the heat I brought them for Style watch them one time and they shriveled up so I can't say that this is a great Buy
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tweet

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay fastened
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but the top fastening was constantly coming undone. I have this type of fastening with several other aprons and they work fine, but maybe because the straps are thinner, it slips out of the fastener. I'm donating, even though I like the look, feel, and fit of this apron.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dozen of them. Use them as dinner napkins as well as kitchen towels. It all matches-they launder beautifully and hide little stains with the pattern. I will never use paper napkins again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hanging loop broke after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. They’re heat resistant and I like the design. I was disappointed that the hanging loop broke on one after two weeks, since I do have them hanging in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Avail

customer_reviews.title: thick and lovely
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful and its thick enough to grab hit stuff. It's a great buy. I love the length too. I also love that its plaid to match the rest plsid kitchen decor i jave
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: So not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these pot holders. I just burned my fingers taking a baking tray out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: barbara2474

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put as hand towels in our bathroom they are adorable they probably are not great for a lot of absorbency but I bought mine for decoration mostly
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: These towels are a little bigger in size than other dish/kitchen towels I have used before. They seem too thin to be considered towels but are ok for the decorative purposes I want them for.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buffalo check!
customer_reviews.text: I love the buffalo check! They are pretty big and seem to be good quality cotton material. I haven’t washed them yet; I’ll update this review if they get wonky after washing but, at this point I love them!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric for decoration as I used it for
customer_reviews.text: As expected, did not use for drying dishes but only for decoration, so I’m not able to say if they work for a drying towel purpose. But they look fabulous and the quality seems like it’s from good fabric
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did was washed them when I received them because it Didn’t even come wrapped. They came out super wrinkly, had a weird smell, and the white checkered part turned yellowish. It would be cute just for decoration. 1 out of 10, do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice linen towel....was looking more for a softer cotton fabric not this stiff one but my mistake I guess because I must not have read it
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute but clearly cheap! You get what you pay for. One of them got a little cosmetically burnt immediately on first use. They’re not bad, just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Crandell

customer_reviews.title: Buffalo plaid dishtowels
customer_reviews.text: Received this package of 3 today and loved the look and size of them. They are cotton and may not be as absorbent as terry cloth, but that is ok. I used one as a table runner on my coffee table and another one on a wooden box for display. I will keep one in my kitchen & use with my dishes. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Clouds Jewelry & Gifts for the Soul

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Dish towel
customer_reviews.text: Love the heft and absorbency of these towels. Bigger than usual and looks great after each wash. The best I have ever used for the past 50 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine E Ramos

customer_reviews.title: The blue dye bleeds
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the dye color bled after the first wash and they are no longer blue and white check as the blue dye ran, turning the white check blue. It also dyed everything else in the same load of laundry blue. I am disappointed because they looked cute but it did not work out.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Gloriod

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made, nice, vivid color (shamrock green).
customer_reviews.text: Heavy material, well-made, & just the color I needed for my St. Patrick's Day kitchen decorations. I will most certainly be buying more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: rmichellev

customer_reviews.title: Careful!
customer_reviews.text: While these mitts look nice, they are crap. You better have a plan when you take a hot pan out of the oven- they don't offer much protection. Had to order a different set.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our home for the holidays. Not great for wiping up spills, but great for decorative purposes.
customer_reviews.author: tonyah

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to bend fabric to grab items.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to grab pans weather hot or cold. I have large hands and there isn’t much bend in the fabric. In order to grab the pans you have to bend your thumbs to grab your items. I would prefer mitts that don’t bend at the thumb. I would have returned these but I had a burn mark on the fabric. These are already in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again or recommend, too thin
customer_reviews.text: These are ok but not as thick as I'd like ....after holding a hot pan for more than a few seconds you feel the heat.
customer_reviews.author: JulieBoo Bah

customer_reviews.title: Thick, good quality and so cute
customer_reviews.text: Go well with our blue rooster themed kitchen. Well made and work really good to keep you from burning your hands
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too thick to actually using in baking..can't get a grip on the pot or pan.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute!! Great as a decoration and also great to use! I will buy again to gift to others! So cute!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits so great, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the red and black apron. Nice heavy material, nice neck strap, love the front pocket, excellent quality apron. Already washed it once and laid out to dry, still looks and feels brand new.
customer_reviews.author: dy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but stain easily
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them but they stain easily. The green color is great in our kitchen! I don’t think they’re too thin but I wouldn’t hold something hot for very long with these.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Gojan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife for holiday dinners.
customer_reviews.text: We do host a lot of holiday parties here as well as other parties sometimes. It seems very well made fits very well with adjustment I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fabric but shrinks
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this apron. However, it shrunk A LOT when I washed it. It is now very very short. Also requires an iron due to the fabric. I would have preferred something I can just take out of the dryer and wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be working great and allow you to hold a hot pan handle or cooking sheet for a while if needed. They are cute, but bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: These mittens have very poor heat resistance. When I took a tray out from the oven and bring it to the table. They get so hot and I couldn't hold it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: L Z

customer_reviews.title: Think outside the box
customer_reviews.text: I used them as a "table runner" on the coffee tables in a living room to match the pillows, small rug and throw I bought...all blend very well
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: Very masculine
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my grandson for Christmas. He is currently living in an RV. Fits right in with his decor.
customer_reviews.author: Granee Janee

customer_reviews.title: Cute- but wrinkly
customer_reviews.text: They are very stiff and come out of the dryer incredibly wrinkled. While the colors are vibrant- I needed to iron them before setting them out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for designed apron
customer_reviews.text: Great quality apron, nice color and fabric. Useful and pretty. Sizing is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They're cotton so the heat does get through but, like I said, they're cotton. They are a pretty shade of pink and I'd probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: These pot holders are made of the greatest quality! I read the reviews and everyone raved. Being from Missouri, I needed to see them for myself. The thickness of the pads was more than I expected. The stitching on the pads looked very secure. I think these will last a very long time. I plan on looking for other products made by this company!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Good dishtowels that hold up
customer_reviews.text: These are cute dish towels. I’ve put them in the wash a lot and they hold up well and don’t loose their color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Absorbency
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand at a retail store about a year ago and the towels were great; super absorbent so I ordered these; I love the buffalo check. I was sorely disappointed when I went to use them. They have zero absorbency for dishes. I ended up pulling out another dishtowel to finish drying the dishes. I would return them but I washed them before use.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. They are soft and the black and red colors are bright. They are defiantly red and black if your wondering. I recently bought a red and black buffalo plaid window valance that wasn't truly red and black but burgandy and black, so that we an important factor for me. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Always April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Christmas time
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to swap out for my normal dish towels around Christmas time. These are durable and well made of a fairly thick cotton. They don't absorb a ton of liquid, so don't think these are incredibly plush or absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This apron is way smaller than it looks. I bought it as a gift and I expected it to come larger than it really is. I’m really disappointed because I paid money for this and I wanted it to be just perfect. The material is great though, and the design is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Best oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are not left or right hand specific. Super cute checked pattern goes great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: For decoration only
customer_reviews.text: After handling a pan heated at 425 degrees, the heat resistance only lasted about 10 seconds before burning my hand, which was not enough time to hold the pan and serve dinner. But if you need a decoration, then these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a Cosplay
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this for a cosplay rather than cooking, so I’d say this is very nice! Long enough strings for my size (women’s medium). If anyone wants to cosplay Mabel from Animal Crossing, this is nearly uncanny!!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Poe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: A+ seller! Item as described! Arrived quickly and item was of superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Stevens

customer_reviews.title: They look nice but not very useful.
customer_reviews.text: They are great for baking to rolling out dough on. They don’t seem to absorb very well.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great for decoration
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but I wish they would dry the dishes better. It just spreads around the water.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Like the towels - the color is a little off.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted pink hand towels for the kitchen. These are cute towels but they are more peach than pink. That's the only negative thing I have to say about them. They arrived very quickly and are a good quality. I haven't used them yet so can't speak to durability or versatility. Gave those a 5 anyway (I'm an optimist).
customer_reviews.author: Barb B.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the look of these towels
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the look of these towels. The only con is that they aren't super absorbent for spills and such. They are fine to dry my hands after washing though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me and my daughter and loved them. Good quality and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plaid dish towel
customer_reviews.text: Come out of the dryer in great shape. Cute in my kitchen. Dries stuff fast
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but not great absorbency
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, but they're not great for drying dishes, which is what I got them for. They are good quality and look nice, but if you need something to help dry your dishes, you may want to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I cant easily get my hand all the way in because the opening is too small for my forearms.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: How adorable!!! I think these hand towels are more like a flour sack towel. When it comes to drying dishes I prefer this type of material but for drying hands I prefer more of a terry cloth which is why there are two towels hanging from my stove. That said, I doubt you’d be disappointed using this cute towel for drying your hands anyway. I mean buffalo check...😍
customer_reviews.author: Beka Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding holiday color in kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Non super absorbent, but stayed looking nice and neatbthrough month of December with frequent hand drying. I bought these to add some holiday color in my kitchen and these were great. I would order more in other colors just for the nice quality. They got packed up with the Christmas decorations and I plan to use them every year for the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyZee

product_meta.title: DII Cotton Adjustable Buffalo Check Plaid Apron with Pocket & Extra-Long Ties, 32 x 28", Men and Women Kitchen Apron for Cooking, Baking, Crafting, Gardening, & BBQ - Navy & Cream
product_meta.description: Color:Navy & Cream| Size:ApronDII has created this Buffalo Check Apron which ties in to farmhouse decor or country chic looks to add an extra bit of charm and color to your kitchen. This Checkered apron is perfect for cooking, baking, cleaning, gardening, serving, or hosting, they also make great additions to gift baskets for housewarming parties, Mother’s Day, birthdays, or holidays. These 100% Cotton apron for women or men come with an adjustable neck strap and extra-long ties that can wrap around your waist and tied in the front, the adjustable long aprons for cooking fits most sizes and is suitable for either men or women. The gigham apron also comes with a sturdy pocket to easily hold seasoning packets, spoons, meat thermometer, grill slips, cellphone, or recipe cards while you cook. DII cooking apron cotton material makes them easy to care for made with high quality woven 100% cotton aprons for women and men prevent grease spots and spills on your clothes. Fringed aprons for women with pockets are perfect for home kitchens, cafés, workshops, outdoor BBQs, and more. Aprons are a great basic kitchen essential to help protect clothing from splatters and spills. We offer multiple colors options that easily coordinate with most kitchen décor. DII buffalo check aprons coordinate well with our matching buffalo check dishtowels and dishcloth sets, buffalo check tablecloth, buffalo check table runner and napkins for a complete collection simply search DII Buffalo Check!
feature_bullets: ONE SIZE FITS MOST SIZES - The apron measure 32x28", adjustable extra-long straps are 36" on each side to wrap around neck and waist, one size fits most men and women.

EASY CARE LONG-LASTING MATERIAL - 100% cotton fabric, machine washable. Wash with cold water, gentle cycle, & tumble dry low, use low iron if needed. Do not bleach them or run them through a hot dryer.

A GREAT COLLECTION FOR YOUR KITCHEN: DII Buffalo Check aprons are available in an assortment of colors and coordinate with our dishtowels, oven mitts, potholders, napkins, tablecloths, and table runners.

EMBROIDER FOR A PERSONALIZED GIFT - Add a unique message or name to your apron. Easily include a logo, monogram, or embroidery to make this apron a great gift for birthdays, Mother's day, holidays, housewarming, and hostess gifts.

MORE DII OPTIONS FOR YOUR HOME- DII offers an assortment of delightful products including kitchen linens, storage solutions, pet supplies, rugs, throws, and more, to explore our other collections click the DII link at the top of the page.

specifications.Material Care Instructions: Machine wash colors separately • Cold water • Gentle cycle • Tumble dry low • Low iron
